list_of_reviews.review_title: KuCoin stole all my NEBL token
list_of_reviews.review: KuCoin stole all my NEBL token. Of course they say they delisted them, but I never received an e-mail. NEBL token don't just disappear 'magically' from your exchange wallet. So either they are still there or you sold them. Either way there is still my money around and you could either send me the token to my external wallet or send me the US$ or BTC which you received from selling. But till now they seem to not be willing to do anything to compensate me. This is stealing. Avoid this exchange!

The worst support ever! Case: P2P order closed while I was transferring the fiat payment to merchant. When I returned to the order, it was closed and I couldn't approve my fiat money transferring. I contacted with merchant and she has approved she's got my money on her bank account. The support suggested to the merchant to send back fiat money to me, but merchant couldn't do this because of bank transaction restriction. The only way to solve this was to release crypto from her account to my. The merchant told that kucoin has internal ID for this type of transaction and that she already did such operation and it takes about 30 minutes. After that support asked the merchant to prepare certain USDT amount on her account and just disappeared! I've been waiting 3 days and nobody can tell me why it takes so long! Both of sides have agreement, the merchant account is blocked, crypto is frozen. The only thing they has to do – to send blocked crypto to me! Also they blocked me in their telegram group once I started to claim there :(

Worst customer service ever. I signed up to trade on KuCoin mid January 2024. I’ve inquired about my verification status numerous times. Each time I get the same response. “Your documents have been well received …”Blah blah blah. Pretty they have bots responding automatically. We’re now mid April and my status has not changed nor have they responded any differently. Ridiculous. I have given up at this point.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Don't trust KuCoin with your funds!
list_of_reviews.review: I have been using KuCoin for a couple of year and thought they where a reliable marketplace, but unfortunately they are not.I did not login to my account for nearly a year during the bear market, but when I did I found that one of my main assets (FKX) were missing from my account. Apparently KuCoin decided to delist FKX, but did not feel the need to contact me about it to let me know. Instead they only made an announcement on their own website and after I did not withdrew my assets within their timespan, they claimed that I had forfeited the funds and took them for them selves. It would have taken just one text, email or phone call and I would have withdrawn the funds immediately. They know exactly how to reach you if they have a new listing or promotion, but when they decide to delist a token then they suddenly don't have your contact information available.I can only guess the reason behind this, but if you think of it than is does make a great business model to 'steal' the funds of the people that trusted you to safely hold them. Please be warned and watch out with whom you do business. There are more reliable marketplaces out there!#StaySafe #Frauds

list_of_reviews.review_title: Tried two times to send fiat money to…

First customer agent said pls send less money. Result:also unsuccessful. Second time - within 24hours an expert will contact you. Result: no help - no contact. The customer service is TERRIBLE!!!!!!!!!

It's very awful and bad experience ever in exchange world! Not recommended to anyone!

I had a VRA entry of 0.0073 and set the tp to 0.008222; the service indicates it was tp'd, however, the price never reached that area and my bot was closed; It happened 3 times already with similar issues and customer service is not being very useful or knowing how to help. Bot ID: 1452428525692232

The worst support ever! Case: P2P order closed while I was transferring the fiat payment to merchant. When I returned to the order, it was closed and I couldn't approve my fiat money transferring. I contacted with merchant and she has approved she's got my money on her bank account. The support suggested to the merchant to send back fiat money to me, but merchant couldn't do this because of bank transaction restriction. The only way to solve this was to release crypto from her account to my. The merchant told that kucoin has internal ID for this type of transaction and that she already did such operation and it takes about 30 minutes. After that support asked the merchant to prepare certain USDT amount on her account and just disappeared! I've been waiting 3 days and nobody can tell me why it takes so long! Both of sides have agreement, the merchant account is blocked, crypto is frozen. The only thing they has to do – to send blocked crypto to me! Also they blocked me in their telegram group once I started to claim there :(

I have moved to another country and sent an email to kucoin support so I can send in my new ID for verification and yet they now REFUSED me from signing into my account and showed "verification failed or expired".Are you becoming like FTX now?? The customer service is TERRIBLE!!!!!!!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Don't trust KuCoin with your funds!
list_of_reviews.review: I have been using KuCoin for a couple of year and thought they where a reliable marketplace, but unfortunately they are not.I did not login to my account for nearly a year during the bear market, but when I did I found that one of my main assets (FKX) were missing from my account. Apparently KuCoin decided to delist FKX, but did not feel the need to contact me about it to let me know. Instead they only made an announcement on their own website and after I did not withdrew my assets within their timespan, they claimed that I had forfeited the funds and took them for them selves. It would have taken just one text, email or phone call and I would have withdrawn the funds immediately. They know exactly how to reach you if they have a new listing or promotion, but when they decide to delist a token then they suddenly don't have your contact information available.I can only guess the reason behind this, but if you think of it than is does make a great business model to 'steal' the funds of the people that trusted you to safely hold them. Please be warned and watch out with whom you do business. There are more reliable marketplaces out there!#StaySafe #Frauds
Worst customer service ever.  P2p order is in appeal for 48 hours and nothing been done.  Chat service is ignoring me now

Becareful people kucoin exchange cheated me and stole all my money ,it manipulated on my account after i had deposited amount of Usdt then i tried to buy crypto on spot trading ,i found my balance not exist nor i could buy any crypto ! It's very awful and bad experience ever in exchange world! Not recommended to anyone!

Stay away. Customer Service is joke . Worst CS experience I ever had. Incompetent of fixing issues. Their ability seem limited to advising you how to solve it your self. Imagine one day you have an issue and you can not fix. My issue was that the isolated margin borrow & repay transaction history export did not include transactions. Could not file my taxes right.

Just f****** fantastic!!!! KuCoin has grown on me hard and I am kicking myself for leaving it until now, to fully immerse my time in the experience KuCoin has to offer. All the parts that are enjoyed amongst different exchanges, have been brought together for a more complete trading platform. No issues for me thus far... The challenging thing though is to navigate your way through the fully loaded platform which takes some time. Effort + Efficiency = $$$$$$Keep it up there humans!!! Please don't be in the news soon with legal issues. My heart will be broken.

Kucoin has definitely some high potential coins for big gains. Improved massively with new interface. Their fees are also comparable with some of the exchanges top 1 tier. Withdraws took about few hours and unfortunately missed some high opportunities for profit.Hope it will be changed and fixed

I signed up on the platform, made deposits but on unable to withdraw. It only makes sense if account is restricted if there's security change but for settings up security, it doesn't make sense at all. I have lost business deal because of this stupid policy.

list_of_reviews.review_title: A Disheartening Journey to Access My Funds
list_of_reviews.review: For over 5 months, I've been caught in an exhausting loop trying to resolve what seemed like a simple issue with my account, which holds a substantial amount of USDT.Initially, I had faith in KuCoin's support system to promptly address and fix my problem. However, my situation has only become a testament to the painfully slow and ineffective customer service response.Each interaction with support has been met with prolonged delays, leaving me without access to my funds. Their communication strikes me as dismissive and lacking in urgency, as my repeated requests for escalation have gone unheeded. The irony of it all – the automated messages boast of a seamless support experience, yet my reality couldn't be further from that promise.The absence of a resolution and inaccessibility of my assets have led to mounting frustrations. It's hard not to feel that my funds are being held without justification, stirring a worrying notion that they may never intend to resolve the issue – almost as if they're willing to let my USDT slip through the cracks.In all seriousness, this ordeal has left a sour taste in my mouth, and I question the integrity of a service that can so easily disregard the concerns and rights of its users. The thought of my hard-earned money being cavalierly treated by KuCoin is unsettling, to say the least.To anyone considering KuCoin as their trading platform, I urge you to proceed with caution. The features and tools offered mean little if, in the end, access to your funds is compromised by inadequate customer support.

list_of_reviews.review_title: A Disheartening Journey to Access My Funds
list_of_reviews.review: For over 5 months, I've been caught in an exhausting loop trying to resolve what seemed like a simple issue with my account, which holds a substantial amount of USDT.Initially, I had faith in KuCoin's support system to promptly address and fix my problem. However, my situation has only become a testament to the painfully slow and ineffective customer service response.Each interaction with support has been met with prolonged delays, leaving me without access to my funds. Their communication strikes me as dismissive and lacking in urgency, as my repeated requests for escalation have gone unheeded. The irony of it all – the automated messages boast of a seamless support experience, yet my reality couldn't be further from that promise.The absence of a resolution and inaccessibility of my assets have led to mounting frustrations. It's hard not to feel that my funds are being held without justification, stirring a worrying notion that they may never intend to resolve the issue – almost as if they're willing to let my USDT slip through the cracks.In all seriousness, this ordeal has left a sour taste in my mouth, and I question the integrity of a service that can so easily disregard the concerns and rights of its users. The thought of my hard-earned money being cavalierly treated by KuCoin is unsettling, to say the least.To anyone considering KuCoin as their trading platform, I urge you to proceed with caution. The features and tools offered mean little if, in the end, access to your funds is compromised by inadequate customer support.

The worst support ever!P2P transaction was failed and they blocked my withdrawals. Its almost one month that I am waiting and the customer service sent me an email that we are busy and you need to wait!! How long can a customer in crypto world wait and see?? I am with Kucoin for almost 2 years now but now I really understand what people say about not trusting them.

Each time I get the same response. “Your documents have been well received …”Blah blah blah. Pretty they have bots responding automatically. We’re now mid April and my status has not changed nor have they responded any differently. Ridiculous. I have given up at this point.

Either way there is still my money around and you could either send me the token to my external wallet or send me the US$ or BTC which you received from selling. But till now they seem to not be willing to do anything to compensate me. This is stealing. Avoid this exchange!

The worst support ever! Case: P2P order closed while I was transferring the fiat payment to merchant. When I returned to the order, it was closed and I couldn't approve my fiat money transferring. I contacted with merchant and she has approved she's got my money on her bank account. The support suggested to the merchant to send back fiat money to me, but merchant couldn't do this because of bank transaction restriction. The only way to solve this was to release crypto from her account to my. The merchant told that kucoin has internal ID for this type of transaction and that she already did such operation and it takes about 30 minutes. After that support asked the merchant to prepare certain USDT amount on her account and just disappeared! I've been waiting 3 days and nobody can tell me why it takes so long! Both of sides have agreement, the merchant account is blocked, crypto is frozen. The only thing they has to do – to send blocked crypto to me! Also they blocked me in their telegram group once I started to claim there :(

list_of_reviews.review_title: Don't trust KuCoin with your funds!
list_of_reviews.review: I have been using KuCoin for a couple of year and thought they where a reliable marketplace, but unfortunately they are not.I did not login to my account for nearly a year during the bear market, but when I did I found that one of my main assets (FKX) were missing from my account. Apparently KuCoin decided to delist FKX, but did not feel the need to contact me about it to let me know. Instead they only made an announcement on their own website and after I did not withdrew my assets within their timespan, they claimed that I had forfeited the funds and took them for them selves. It would have taken just one text, email or phone call and I would have withdrawn the funds immediately. They know exactly how to reach you if they have a new listing or promotion, but when they decide to delist a token then they suddenly don't have your contact information available.I can only guess the reason behind this, but if you think of it than is does make a great business model to 'steal' the funds of the people that trusted you to safely hold them. Please be warned and watch out with whom you do business. There are more reliable marketplaces out there!#StaySafe #Frauds

list_of_reviews.review_title: A Disheartening Journey to Access My Funds
list_of_reviews.review: For over 5 months, I've been caught in an exhausting loop trying to resolve what seemed like a simple issue with my account, which holds a substantial amount of USDT.Initially, I had faith in KuCoin's support system to promptly address and fix my problem. However, my situation has only become a testament to the painfully slow and ineffective customer service response.Each interaction with support has been met with prolonged delays, leaving me without access to my funds. Their communication strikes me as dismissive and lacking in urgency, as my repeated requests for escalation have gone unheeded. The irony of it all – the automated messages boast of a seamless support experience, yet my reality couldn't be further from that promise.The absence of a resolution and inaccessibility of my assets have led to mounting frustrations. It's hard not to feel that my funds are being held without justification, stirring a worrying notion that they may never intend to resolve the issue – almost as if they're willing to let my USDT slip through the cracks.In all seriousness, this ordeal has left a sour taste in my mouth, and I question the integrity of a service that can so easily disregard the concerns and rights of its users. The thought of my hard-earned money being cavalierly treated by KuCoin is unsettling, to say the least.To anyone considering KuCoin as their trading platform, I urge you to proceed with caution. The features and tools offered mean little if, in the end, access to your funds is compromised by inadequate customer support.

list_of_reviews.review_title: A Disheartening Journey to Access My Funds
list_of_reviews.review: For over 5 months, I've been caught in an exhausting loop trying to resolve what seemed like a simple issue with my account, which holds a substantial amount of USDT.Initially, I had faith in KuCoin's support system to promptly address and fix my problem. However, my situation has only become a testament to the painfully slow and ineffective customer service response.Each interaction with support has been met with prolonged delays, leaving me without access to my funds. Their communication strikes me as dismissive and lacking in urgency, as my repeated requests for escalation have gone unheeded. The irony of it all – the automated messages boast of a seamless support experience, yet my reality couldn't be further from that promise.The absence of a resolution and inaccessibility of my assets have led to mounting frustrations. It's hard not to feel that my funds are being held without justification, stirring a worrying notion that they may never intend to resolve the issue – almost as if they're willing to let my USDT slip through the cracks.In all seriousness, this ordeal has left a sour taste in my mouth, and I question the integrity of a service that can so easily disregard the concerns and rights of its users. The thought of my hard-earned money being cavalierly treated by KuCoin is unsettling, to say the least.To anyone considering KuCoin as their trading platform, I urge you to proceed with caution. The features and tools offered mean little if, in the end, access to your funds is compromised by inadequate customer support.

list_of_reviews.review_title: KuCoin stole all my NEBL token

So either they are still there or you sold them. Either way there is still my money around and you could either send me the token to my external wallet or send me the US$ or BTC which you received from selling. But till now they seem to not be willing to do anything to compensate me. This is stealing. Avoid this exchange!

Kucoin has definitely some high potential coins for big gains. Improved massively with new interface. Their fees are also comparable with some of the exchanges top 1 tier. Lot of unnecessary emails and are quite annoying without unsubscribing. Had lot of issues with support and every time they said to stay in line. Withdraws took about few hours and unfortunately missed some high opportunities for profit.Hope it will be changed and fixed

Just f****** fantastic!!!! KuCoin has grown on me hard and I am kicking myself for leaving it until now, to fully immerse my time in the experience KuCoin has to offer. All the parts that are enjoyed amongst different exchanges, have been brought together for a more complete trading platform. No issues for me thus far... The challenging thing though is to navigate your way through the fully loaded platform which takes some time. Effort + Efficiency = $$$$$$Keep it up there humans!!! Please don't be in the news soon with legal issues. My heart will be broken.
